content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (no additional drill found) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
-  Two burner inserters at positions (x=39.5 y=-79.5) and (x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
Connected by pipe groups at positions (x=107.5 y=-34.5) and (x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport belt at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of two transport belts at positions (x=63.5 y=-53.5) and (x=64.5 y=-53.5)
Connected to a belt group at position (x=40.5 y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
- Ensure that burner mining drills and burners are fueled before use
- Ensure that boilers are fueled before use

### Errors when entities are not connected
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network
- Ensure that entities are properly connected by pipes or belts before use

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that burner inserters have source items before use
- Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients before use

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
